actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to relating to the White Clay Creek Watershed in the States of Delaware and Pennsylvania.
short_title: White Clay Creek Watershed Study Act

summary.text: White Clay Creek Watershed Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a plan to conserve the natural resource values of the White Clay Creek Watershed, Delaware and Pennsylvania, which is to be submitted to Congress after public hearings. Provides for the joint participation of or consultation with the Governors of Delaware and Pennsylvania. Requires such plan to: (1) provide for a resource assessment; (2) propose boundaries to protect the resources of such watershed; and (3) recommend State and Federal actions to protect the natural resource value of such watershed.

titles.title: White Clay Creek Watershed Study Act
A bill to relating to the White Clay Creek Watershed in the States of Delaware and Pennsylvania.
